other_tests.findings: Effective in maintaining near-normal serum and urinary calcium levels; reduction in clinical events related to hypocalcemia.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Significant reduction in hypocalcemic seizures and emergency hospitalizations over the first three years of treatment.
